1567510.name: Pistol Whip Official Soundtrack Vol. 2
1567510.description:
The highly-requested, highly-anticipated official Pistol Whip Vol. 2 soundtrack is here for your Steam music library. Featuring music from Magic Sword and Seeking Blue, along with artists from Kannibalen Records, including HVDES, Black Tiger Sex Machine; and more... volume two contains all five post-launch tracks as well as all tracks from Pistol Whip's first cinematic campaign, "2089." It also includes both original and exclusive Pistol Whip mixes.

Inspired by a wide range of our favorite films, styles, and genres, the Pistol Whip Official Soundtrack Vol. 2 is an eclectic selection of post-launch tracks fueling the unstoppable action of VR smash-hit Pistol Whip.
